name: Praharsh Nanavati
about: Causal Representation Learning for Treatment Effect Estimation
moreInfo: I am Praharsh, a fifth year BS-MS thesis student at IISER, Bhopal. I am a Data Science and Engineering major, and I have a minor in EECS. I am interested in theoretical aspects of Machine Learning, and Causal Inference. I have mainly worked in the realm of Trustworthy and Reliable ML. By doing so, I wish to motivate the use of causally-aware models for informed inference while preserving model interpretability and accuracy. Apart from this, I am always interested in discussing music and sports!

name: Anuradha Mahato
moreInfo: I'm a final-year student of an integrated BS-MS course specializing in data science and engineering at IISER Bhopal. I have done coursework and projects in machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, artificial intelligence, and NLP. My interest primarily lies in deep learning and computer vision.

name: Kunal Dayanand Zarikunte
moreInfo: I am a 4th year undergrad in the Data Science and Engineering department at IISER Bhopal. I am currently exploring and studying various techniques and models within the field of deep learning to deepen my understanding.

name: Amish Anand
about: Comprehensive Study of Portfolio Optimization Methods for the Commodity Markets
moreInfo: A machine learning and deep learning enthusiast who likes to apply these principles to solve real world problems.

name: Aayushman
about: Skincon MaskedGOT for fairer skin prediction
moreInfo: I am a data science and engineering major at IISERB. I have a keen interest in Statistics, Deep Learning and Computer Vision.

name: Rohit Kumar
about: Addressing Spatial Issues In Multi-Source Satellite Precipitation Products
moreInfo: I have keen interest in application of traditional deep learning frameworks in different fields. As my BS Thesis work I aim to develop novel deep learning frameworks and compare it with traditional statistical models to improve precipitation forecast.
